description: Beat the game within 1 hour and 30 minutes. (Specter Knight)

name: SPK_MoodyKnight

name: KK_Again
description: Finish New Game Plus. (King Knight)

name: KK_HouseChamp
description: Clear all 4 houses of Joustus, and win the final battle... (King Knight)

name: KK_Beeline
description: Complete the game in fewer than 25 stages. (King Knight)

name: KK_NakedKing
description: Finish the game without acquiring any heirlooms, health upgrades, or vigor upgrades. Armors are ok! (King Knight)

name: KK_HurryUp
description: Beat the game within 1 hour and 30 minutes. (King Knight)

name: KK_FearlessChamp
description: Clear all 4 houses of Joustus without buying or reclaiming cards from Chester. (Not in New Game+) (King Knight)

name: KK_KingOfCards
description: Defeat every possible Joustus opponent. (King Knight)

name: KK_PatronOfTheArts
description: Commission a finished portrait! (King Knight)

name: KK_GetOutOfMyRoom
description: Find King Knight's secret room! (King Knight)

name: KK_ThatsMine
description: Lose a unique card, then win it back! (King Knight)

description: Use each one of Chester's Cheat Cards. (King Knight)

name: KK_HeirloomsOnly
description: Use only heirlooms to defeat any boss! (King Knight)

name: KK_JumpEconomy
description: Finish a stage and jump fewer than 10 times. (King Knight)

name: KK_Heartless
description: Finish a Joustus Judge stage without dying or collecting any food or health hearts. (King Knight)

name: KK_GemSweep

name: BT_SmackBack
description: As Shovel Knight, win the match with a reflected projectile. (Showdown)

name: BT_DestructionDominoes
description: As Plague Knight, defeat multiple foes by hurtling through them with a single Spin Burst. (Showdown)

name: BT_DarkDunk
description: As Specter Knight, use a Dash Slash to win by dunking a foe into lava or a pit that you would've fallen into. (Showdown)

name: BT_FancyFeet
description: As King Knight, reach the winning gem while still spinning after bashing into a foe. (Showdown)

name: BT_StayWhereYouAre
description: As Shield Knight, use a single Shield Rush to both block a projectile and win the match. (Showdown)

name: BT_FromShadow
description: As Black Knight, win the match by dodging a player and hitting them with a Dark Wave. (Showdown)

name: BT_AerialAce
description: As Propeller Knight, defeat 2 or more foes without touching the ground. (Showdown)

name: BT_Undermined
description: As Mole Knight, absorb 10 hits while submerged in a single match. (Showdown)

name: BT_ChainReaction
description: As Treasure Knight, win the match by defeating a foe with a bouncing diamond that you popped. (Showdown)

name: BT_PlowerPower
description: As Polar Knight, defeat multiple foes with a single use of the Polar Plow. (Showdown)

name: BT_Whoops
description: As Tinker Knight, win the match by knocking an enemy into lava or a pit with the Definitely Intentional Trip. (Showdown)

name: BT_HoverQueenie
description: As The Enchantress, remain in the air for 30 seconds without touching the ground. (Showdown)

name: BT_TheStormIsComing
description: As Baz, stun multiple foes using one use of Electrify, then hit them before they recover. (Showdown)

name: BT_ReizeForTheSky
description: As Reize, win the match by Dive Kicking an enemy to propel yourself to the winning gem. (Showdown)

name: BT_HatTrick
description: As Mr. Hat, get a KO with each of your 3 hats in a single match. (Showdown)

name: BT_ShroudedStrike
description: As Phantom Striker, use the Strike Step to reach the winning gem while donning the Phantom Shroud. (Showdown)

name: BT_Elementary
description: As Mona, win a match by knocking a charged hazardous potion at a foe. (Showdown)

name: BT_FromNowhere
description: As Dark Reize, defeat 3 foes as you exit your teleport in a single match. (Showdown)

name: BT_HopsAndDreams
description: As Goldarmor, win the match by down thrusting off of the Throwing Anchor to reach the winning gem. (Showdown)

name: BT_LiquidAssets
description: As Liquid Samurai, win a match by collecting 3 gems without breaking your run stride. (Showdown)

name: BT_DoneInOne
description: Finish Story Mode without using a continue. (Showdown)

name: BT_PercysPal
description: Attain a score of 100,000 in Targets. (Showdown)

name: BT_SureFooted
description: Finish 10 matches in any stage with lava or a pit without falling in. (Showdown)

name: BT_ItemLord
description: Use each of the items once. (Showdown)

name: BT_OrderOfThwarters
description: Successfully parry 10 times during one match. (Showdown)

name: BT_WarpWalker
description: Fall through the warp floor 50 times. (Showdown)

name: BT_Shatterer
description: Complete Story Mode on Hard difficulty. (Showdown)

name: BT_MagmaDay
description: Knock opponents into lava 50 times. (Showdown)

name: BT_TrouppleTango
description: Defeat 50 Troupples during an encounter with the Troupple King. (Showdown)

name: BT_Eliminator
description: KO 100 total opponents. (Showdown)

name: BT_Stomped
description: Win a stock match of 3 or more without losing a single stock. (Showdown)

name: BT_Clutch
description: Win Sudden Death 5 times. (Showdown)

name: BT_ChestersChum
description: See 20 different modes in Chester's Choice. (Showdown)
